website_summaries.verdict: Dubbed as the fastest and lightest shoe from Puma’s TFX Sprint series, the TFX Sprint V4 keeps young athletes as its inspiration. With the technical features of this track and field shoe, enhanced speed and support are to be expected. For its price, many customers claim that the TFX Sprint V4 exceeds their expectations.
pros: The Puma TFX Sprint V4 is very comfortable, noted some runners
Several state that the shoe is highly durable
It has a great fit, remarked many
The shoe is very light, expressed numerous reviewers
Some note that the shoe provides good traction
cons: The laces easily unravel, commented a few athletes
According to some, the shoe does not provide sufficient support

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors, light weight, and they fit as spikes are expected to fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these spikes for a Corporate Company track event. Not sure how/why there are so many reviews of them being "too small" BUT sprint spikes should fit snuggly without cramping your toes. You do not want any excess room in your spikes. Having too much room will cause you to lose power and speed when you race. I am a size 9 and I ordered a size 9 -They fit as spikes are expected to fit. They are light weight and for $30.00 I can't complain. Love the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Puma track shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes very neat on my daughters feet, does run a bit small. She's 11 wears a women's 8, bought a size 8 at first but it was too tight so i got the 8 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe great price
customer_reviews.text: Some people are saying they are too small but your supposed to go one size up from you regular size , im a 7 & bought an 8 and they fit perfect I love em
customer_reviews.author: QueenK

customer_reviews.title: Way TOO Small
customer_reviews.text: Way too small!!! Not true to size at all. And it sucks, because my daughter was so excited about these. They are beautiful! But I ordered a size 9 and they fit like a size 8. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Garza

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Both shoes came apart after 30 minutes of warming up. Unfortunately I was at a out of state meet and these were my daughter's first time using these track shoes. Needles to say the meet was a total disaster.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Order one full size bigger
customer_reviews.text: Order one full size bigger. We did and they fit perfect! They look cute on and function well! Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: onionz

customer_reviews.title: The women's size 6 are easily a full size too small
customer_reviews.text: The women's size 6 are easily a full size too small. Had to return them so never got the change to try them out.
customer_reviews.author: cardio teacher

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I Ordered a woman’s 8 and my daughter foot could not get in the shoe. The shoe is like a size 5. I will be returning these for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Blessedmom

customer_reviews.title: 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She has a meet today and the anticipation is real. Looking for PRs.
customer_reviews.author: E. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Came in the knick of time for my sister and she loves it! Ordered a size 10 women's and it's true to size!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cii

customer_reviews.title: Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: Lovely product ,but run small she wears 7 I got 8.5 and its still ah little too small I hope it stretches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work as a first pair of spikes for my 7 year old daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Lilpezzo98

customer_reviews.title: Great spikes but run a little small...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them for a larger size. We ordered an 8 1/2 because that's my daughter's usual size. The 9 1/2 fits her perfect.
customer_reviews.author: momo47

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Bought these for my daughter for tack and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the color and the fit! Great shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly G.

customer_reviews.title: Great track shoes
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these! She was very happy to have these for track.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super shoes, my daughter is really happy with. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Graffi

customer_reviews.title: they are good. She likes them - she says it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter - her first experience wearing them in track. For the money, they are good. She likes them - she says it is better than wearing her "normal" running shoes (for sprinting, especially) and the price was FAR better than most of the options. If you're looking for a place to start that won't break the bank, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the look! Very dependable and light on the soles
customer_reviews.author: lacey queen

customer_reviews.title: Great as
customer_reviews.text: Fit my daughter well she Loves it for her school sports. Amazon again. Great as always
customer_reviews.author: Earl

customer_reviews.title: Shoes will be returned 3/22/16 (2 pr)
customer_reviews.text: The child attempted to put them on but they were too small, plus, she said she really needed practice tennis for track practice. She wasn't clear in what she needed. I also received 2 pair of cleats in error. I will ship both pair back on 3/22/16. Thanks Charline R. Thompson
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: THEY SUCK! First day I wore them 7 spikes fell out after I made sure they were tight. They also turned my socks purple and blue even after I washed them like three times. Defiantly would not buy them, don't go cheap. Don't buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Berens

product_meta.title: Puma - Womens Tfx Sprint V4 Shoes
feature_bullets: Striped track spike with PUMA brand callouts on sides and counter
Lightweight Pebax outsole with eight-pin spike plate
